1101312.name: Bayonets
1101312.desc:
Always Active: begin Encounters with 15 [FireBulletPropellant]

If this unit spent [FireBulletPropellant] with Skills or Passives, gain [AttackDmgUp] equal to the amount spent next turn (max 3)

When flipping a Coin that spends [FireBulletPropellant]: while not having [FireBulletPropellant] does not cancel this unit's attacks, the Coin's On Hit "inflict [Combustion]" and "inflict [Combustion] Count" effects do not activate

1101321.name: Reloader
1101321.desc:
When the 1 ally Identity with the earliest Deployment order among those using [Bullet] finishes their attack, if their current [Bullet] count is fewer than half (rounded up), regain half of the maximum [Bullet] capacity (rounded up; once per Encounter; max [Bullet] regained: 5)

- If the [Bullet] receiving Identity has separate values for Potency and Count, they will gain them at random
- If either Potency or Count of [Bullet] is maxed out, gain whichever is not maxed
- This effect does not activate if there are no Identities that use [Bullet]

1101301.name: Ammunition Tribute
1101301.desc:
When the 1 ally Identity with the earliest Deployment order among those using [Bullet] finishes their attack, if their current [Bullet] count is fewer than half (rounded up), spend [FireBulletPropellant] on self equal to the total [Bullet] count the affected unit spent and supply them with the same amount of [Bullet] as [FireBulletPropellant] this unit just spent. (can spend up to 3 ammunition) (once per Encounter)

- If the [Bullet] receiving Identity is a Thumb Identity of a higher rank, supply 1 additional [Bullet] they use
- If the [Bullet] receiving Identity has separate values for Potency and Count, they will be supplied at random.
- If either Potency or Count is maxed out, supply whichever is not maxed.

1101311.name: Ammunition Tribute
1101311.desc:
When the 1 ally Identity with the earliest Deployment order among those using [Bullet] finishes their attack, if their current [Bullet] count is fewer than half (rounded up), spend [FireBulletPropellant] on self equal to the total [Bullet] count the affected unit spent and supply them with the same amount of [Bullet] as [FireBulletPropellant] this unit just spent. <style="highlight">(can spend up to 5 ammunition)</style> (once per Encounter)

- If the [Bullet] receiving Identity is a Thumb Identity of a higher rank, supply 1 additional [Bullet] they use
- If the [Bullet] receiving Identity has separate values for Potency and Count, they will be supplied at random.
- If either Potency or Count is maxed out, supply whichever is not maxed.
